General.Name: Orgabio Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Orgabio Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of instant beverage premix manufacturing services to third party brand owners in Malaysia. The company offers instant coffee, food supplement, tea, and chocolate premixes. It also manufactures, sells, and markets house brand instant beverage premixes comprising coffee and tea premixes offered under EveryDay and BrogaHill brand names. In addition, it sells body care products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beranang, Malaysia. Orgabio Holdings Berhad operates as a subsidiary of Ean Yong & Sons Sdn Bhd.
